channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Bins left uncollected for 6 weeks!, 8th June
item.description:
Bins left uncollected for 6 weeks - called council day of missed collection again and still not collected. No feedback as to why they keep getting missed. Other people have now started leaving rubbish on top - bags are ripped open by animals. Had to report last week due to fly tipping and the bins were still not collected. Please get this sorted as it is horrible for the area!

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 38, Shooters Hill Road, Kidbrooke, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Un taxed no mot SORN, 8th June
item.description:
Number one oakmere road using it to stash stolen goods unlocked rusty and un usable see them taking stuff and ramming it in the boot same people responsible for the drink driving the crashes the late night wheel spinning crack smoking and just general ignorance from them

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Oakmere Road, Plumstead, London

item.title: Waste dumped all over Craigâ€™s Court, 8th June
item.description:
Buckets full of glass bin bags dumped next to bins food bins spread all over - glass discarded weeks ago reported then and still here... drugs paraphernalia, urine, feces, why is this tolerated? why aren't the pubs Walker's, Old Shades and Silver Cross required to look after this area more ? why are they allowed to dump waste wherever / whenever they like !??

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 6, Craig's Court, Waterloo, London
Report on FixMyStreet
